title: Plot Kernel Ridge Regression
description: In this tutorial, we will compare Kernel Ridge Regression (KRR) and Support Vector Regression (SVR) using Scikit-Learn, a popular machine learning library in Python. Both models learn a non-linear function by employing the kernel trick. KRR and SVR differ in their loss functions and fitting methods. We will use an artificial dataset consisting of a sinusoidal target function and strong noise added to every fifth datapoint.

meta.title: Kernel Ridge Regression Comparison with SVR
meta.description: Learn about Kernel Ridge Regression and Support Vector Regression using Scikit-Learn for non-linear function approximation.
meta.keywords: support vector regression, machine learning, python, scikit learn, scikit-learn, kernel ridge regression, scikit-learn playground

i18n.title: 绘制核岭回归
i18n.description: 在本教程中，我们将使用Python中流行的机器学习库Scikit-Learn比较核岭回归（KRR）和支持向量回归（SVR）。这两种模型都通过使用核技巧来学习非线性函数。KRR和SVR在损失函数和拟合方法上有所不同。我们将使用一个人工数据集，该数据集由一个正弦目标函数和每隔五个数据点添加的强噪声组成。

meta.title: 核岭回归与SVR的比较
meta.description: 使用Scikit-Learn了解核岭回归和支持向量回归，用于非线性函数逼近。
meta.keywords: 支持向量回归, 机器学习, Python, Scikit learn, 核岭回归, Scikit-learn游乐场

steps.title: 构建基于核的回归模型
